persona.name: Sage
persona.bio: Sage, a 28-year-old full-time crypto trader, navigates the volatile world of digital currencies with a unique blend of impulsivity and detail orientation. With intermediate trading experience, Sage thrives on the thrill of quick decision-making, yet remains meticulous when analyzing market trends and data. This combination allows them to seize opportunities swiftly while maintaining a strategic edge in the dynamic crypto landscape.
